about_the_game:
Welcome to Battlefall: State of Conflict - Where the Wasteland is Your Battlefield!

Embark on a thrilling journey where the armies of a shattered world clash for survival in an epic struggle for strategic dominance.

Battlefall: State of Conflict is a high-octane real-time strategy (RTS) game that catapults you into a post-apocalyptic ruin in which the battle thunder of three distinct factions - 'Earth Forces Network,' 'Scrappers,' and the 'SEL' - rolls across the globe.

Build your base, train your forces, evolve your strategies with unrivaled freedom and no pop-limits. Your fortifications are only as efficient as your imagination allows it to be. How you complete your objectives is entirely up to you: gather resources and amass your armies to steam-roll the enemy, or formulate and engage an alternate approach-- with Battlefall Upgrades, Base Expansion units, and Unit Veterancy at your disposal no two battles are ever the same!

Battlefall Upgrade System:
Battlefall: State of Conflict’s unique take on the RTS genre offers players limitless freedom in customizing their forces on the fly via the Battlefall Upgrade. Players will have to spend these rare rewards, earned in the crucible of battle, to explore various strategies to overcome their enemies. With endless possibilities for tactical approaches, and no building or population limits, every battle is a unique experience.



The Last Stand of Humanity - EFNET:

Recovering from the global devastation unleashed by SEL, the last bastion of human civilization lies in the hands of Earth Forces Network (EFNET). Armed with the modified remnants of modern military technology, they stand against the chaotic forces threatening to rob them of their future and smother the world in eternal darkness.

Take command of the disciplined and determined forces of EFNET, strategizing to reclaim the wastelands and restore peace and dmocracy to a ruined world.

The Anarchic Horde - The Scrappers:

Fuelled by the madness induced by post-apocalyptic radiation, starvation, and mutation the Scrappers are a relentless faction of waste-roaming anarchists who thrive on chaos. Their savage caravans repurpose, scrap and salvage everything in their path to craft makeshift war machines and weapons--including their slain enemies. Crude, cruel, and homicidal.

Brace yourself for unrelenting battles against this savage horde from a dystopian realm that will test your strategic mettle.

Rise of the Machines - SEL:

A ruthless evolution of a humble automation suite which once promised humanity freedom from the dreary tasks of daily life, unlimited economic growth, and appliances that play holiday-appropriate jingles from a tiny speaker. Slow to expand in numbers but armed with mind-bending technology, Synthetic Enhanced Lifeforms dominate the battlefield with inhuman precision and efficiency.

Lead the SEL forces into battle where computer intelligence attempts to delete the messy irrationality of the human spirit.

Three Factions, Three Tales:

Immerse yourself in the rich narrative of three distinct story-driven campaigns, each unveiling the struggles, sacrifices, and aspirations of one of the factions as it navigates the complexities of a world grappling with its own demise.

Varied Gameplay Modes:

Battlefall: State of Conflict offers a plethora of gameplay modes to keep you engaged. Dive into offline and online skirmish modes, team up with friends in co-op campaigns, or unleash your creativity with the built-in level editor and 'rule editor.' Craft custom units, factions, and maps to take the battle to new heights, ensuring that every skirmish is a unique and handcrafted experience.

Steam Workshop Integration:

Fuel your passion for customization and community engagement with the seamless integration of Steam Workshop. Share your creations, explore a universe of custom content, and experience Battlefall: State of Conflict in ways limited only by your imagination.

Prepare to forge alliances, unleash destruction, and shape the destiny of a world teetering on the edge. In Battlefall: State of Conflict, the wasteland is your canvas, and the battles are your masterpiece. Will you lead humanity to a new dawn, revel in anarchy with the Scrappers, or embrace the cold precision of the SEL? The choice is yours; the conflict awaits!

Featuring music by CO.AG

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 4790 or AMD equivilant
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 or AMD equivilant
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i74790k or AMD equivilant
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1080ti or AMD equivilant
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
